description: This file defines the interface IImplement for FbSettings, an abstraction for device settings in the WPEFramework environment. It declares numerous methods for retrieving and setting device parameters such as device make, name, country code, locale, voice guidance settings, and accessibility features, along with subscription mechanisms for change notifications.

classes.name: IFbSettings
classes.description: An interface that provides access to various device settings and their notification subscriptions, explicitly designed for implementation in a modular environment.

methods.name: HandleAppEventNotifier
methods.description: Register or unregister interest for specific application events.

methods.name: GetDeviceMake
methods.description: Retrieve the device manufacturer/make.

methods.name: GetDeviceName
methods.description: Retrieve the device's friendly name.

methods.name: SetDeviceName
methods.description: Set the device's friendly name.

methods.name: GetDeviceSku
methods.description: Retrieve the device's SKU.

methods.name: GetCountryCode
methods.description: Retrieve the device's country code.

methods.name: SetCountryCode
methods.description: Set the device's country code.

methods.name: SubscribeOnCountryCodeChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from country code change notifications.

methods.name: GetTimeZone
methods.description: Retrieve the device's time zone.

methods.name: SetTimeZone
methods.description: Set the device's time zone.

methods.name: SubscribeOnTimeZoneChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from time zone change notifications.

methods.name: GetSecondScreenFriendlyName
methods.description: Retrieve the second screen friendly name.

methods.name: SubscribeOnFriendlyNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from friendly name change notifications.

methods.name: SubscribeOnDeviceNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from device name change notifications.

methods.name: GetLanguage
methods.description: Retrieve the current UI language.

methods.name: SubscribeOnLanguageChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from language change notifications.

methods.name: GetLocale
methods.description: Retrieve the current UI locale.

methods.name: SetLocale
methods.description: Set the UI locale.

methods.name: SubscribeOnLocaleChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from locale change notifications.

methods.name: GetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Retrieve preferred audio languages.

methods.name: SetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Set preferred audio languages.

methods.name: SubscribeOnPreferredAudioLanguagesChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from preferred audio languages change notifications.

methods.name: SetVoiceGuidanceEnabled
methods.description: Enable or disable voice guidance (TTS).

methods.name: SetVoiceGuidanceSpeed
methods.description: Set the voice guidance speed.

methods.name: SubscribeOnAudioDescriptionSettingsChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from audio description settings change notifications.

methods.name: GetAudioDescriptionSettings
methods.description: Retrieve audio description settings as JSON.

methods.name: GetAudioDescriptionsEnabled
methods.description: Check if audio descriptions are enabled.

methods.name: SetAudioDescriptionsEnabled
methods.description: Enable or disable audio descriptions.

methods.name: SubscribeOnAudioDescriptionsEnabledChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from changes in audio descriptions enabled state.

methods.name: GetHighContrastUI
methods.description: Check if high contrast UI is enabled.

methods.name: SubscribeOnHighContrastUIChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from high contrast UI change notifications.

methods.name: GetClosedCaptionsEnabled
methods.description: Check if closed captions are enabled.

methods.name: SetClosedCaptionsEnabled
methods.description: Enable or disable closed captions.

methods.name: SubscribeOnClosedCaptionsEnabledChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from closed captions enabled state changes.

methods.name: GetClosedCaptionsPreferredLanguages
methods.description: Retrieve preferred closed captions languages.

methods.name: SetClosedCaptionsPreferredLanguages
methods.description: Set preferred closed captions languages.

methods.name: SubscribeOnClosedaptionsPreferredLanguagesChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from changes in preferred closed captions languages.

methods.name: SubscribeOnClosedCaptionsSettingsChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from closed captions settings changes.

methods.name: GetVoiceGuidanceNavigationHints
methods.description: Check if voice guidance navigation hints are enabled.

methods.name: SetVoiceGuidanceNavigationHints
methods.description: Enable or disable voice guidance navigation hints.

methods.name: SubscribeOnVoiceGuidanceNavigationHintsChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from voice guidance navigation hints changes.

methods.name: GetVoiceGuidanceRate
methods.description: Retrieve the voice guidance rate.

methods.name: SetVoiceGuidanceRate
methods.description: Set the voice guidance rate.

methods.name: SubscribeOnVoiceGuidanceRateChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from voice guidance rate changes.

methods.name: GetVoiceGuidanceEnabled
methods.description: Check if voice guidance (TTS) is enabled.

methods.name: SubscribeOnVoiceGuidanceEnabledChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from voice guidance enabled state changes.

methods.name: GetVoiceGuidanceSpeed
methods.description: Retrieve the voice guidance speed.

methods.name: SubscribeOnVoiceGuidanceSpeedChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from voice guidance speed changes.

methods.name: SubscribeOnVoiceGuidanceSettingsChanged
methods.description: Subscribe to or unsubscribe from voice guidance settings changes.

ctags.name: IFbSettings
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IFbSettings : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
